column1: I like this cream and you just use a small amount and your done.

I absolutely love this cream. Initially I received a sample of the anti-aging face cream when I purchased the body lotion (which is also amazing). This is a rich thick cream but causes me no clogged pores or breakouts. My husband also discovered he loves this cream as well. It feels luxurious but not heavy. I wish I could get it in store, but as long as I can get it online, Im happy.
